list_definition.definition: a small area of still water

list_definition.definition: a similar area of any liquid
a deep part of a stream or river

They spent the day at the pool.
We put our money into a general pool.

list_definition.definition: to put together for general use

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We pooled our money and bought a caravan that we could all use.
